info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 26 at 1:06AM CDT until June 27 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Hastings NE
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Hastings NE has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Nebraska...
Wood River Near Alda affecting Hall County.
* WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Wood River near Alda.
* WHEN...Until Friday afternoon.
* IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, The left bank overflows, and water floods lowlands and country roads.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:45 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 6.5 feet. - Bankfull stage is 9.0 feet. - Forecast...The river will rapidly rise above flood stage early this morning, cresting around 11.4 feet after sunrise. It is then forecast to gradually fall below flood stage by late this evening but then perhaps remain near-bankfull into sometime Friday. - Minor Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
late tonight at 315 AM CDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL FRIDAY AFTERNOON
